user.title: SFML Stats - Welcome
user.description:
Welcome to SFML Stats!

This integration tracks your solar production, battery, grid usage and calculates costs.

Click NEXT to configure your sensors.

sensors_setup.title: Main Sensors
sensors_setup.description:
Configure the main sensor mappings.

**üè† Home Consumption (W)** and **‚òÄÔ∏è Solar to House (W)** are the most important sensors.
Leave empty if not available.

Solar power comes automatically from SFML.

**Required units:**
- Power: Watt (W)
- Energy: kWh (with daily reset)
- Price: ct/kWh

data_description.sensor_home_consumption: Unit: Watt. Total current power consumption of the entire household incl. all consumers. Required for the real-time energy flow diagram. (Required)
data_description.sensor_home_consumption_daily: Unit: kWh. Total household consumption since midnight. Must reset at 0:00. If not available, the value is calculated from the W sensor. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_solar_to_house: Unit: Watt. Portion of solar power flowing directly to the house. Not the total production ‚Äì only the self-consumption portion! (Required)
data_description.sensor_price_total: Unit: ct/kWh (gross). Dynamic sensor e.g. from Tibber, Octopus Energy or EPEX Spot. Not needed with fixed-price tariff. (Optional)
data_description.weather_entity: Format: weather.xxx. Home Assistant weather integration for weather forecasts in charts. Not a sensor entity ‚Äì must be a weather entity! (Optional)

battery_setup.title: Battery Sensors (Optional)
battery_setup.description:
Configure battery sensors. Skip if you do not have a battery storage system.

W sensors are required for the real-time energy flow diagram.
kWh sensors are optional for more accurate daily statistics.

data_description.sensor_solar_to_battery: Unit: Watt. Solar power flowing directly into the battery. Only the solar charging portion, not total charging! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_solar_daily: Unit: kWh. Solar energy charged into the battery today. Must reset at 0:00. If not available, the value is calculated from the W sensor. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_to_house: Unit: Watt. Power discharged from the battery to the house. Only the discharge portion to the house, not total discharge! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_discharge_daily: Unit: kWh. Energy discharged from the battery to the house today. Must reset at 0:00. If not available, the value is calculated from the W sensor. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_grid_to_battery: Unit: Watt. Grid power used to charge the battery. Only the grid charging portion, not solar charging! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_grid_daily: Unit: kWh. Grid energy used to charge the battery today. Must reset at 0:00. If not available, the value is calculated from the W sensor. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_soc: Unit: Percent (0‚Äì100). Current state of charge (SOC) of the battery. Value must be between 0 and 100, no decimal values like 0.0‚Äì1.0! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_to_grid: Unit: Watt. Battery power fed into the grid. Only relevant for battery grid feed-in, e.g. during negative electricity prices. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_battery_power: Unit: Watt. Total battery power as a single sensor. Positive = charging, Negative = discharging. Only use if no separate charge/discharge sensors are available! (Optional)

smartmeter_setup.title: Smartmeter Sensors (Optional)
smartmeter_setup.description:
Configure smartmeter sensors for accurate grid values.
Skip if you do not have a smartmeter - values will be estimated.

W sensors are required for the real-time energy flow diagram.
kWh sensors are optional for more accurate daily statistics.

data_description.sensor_smartmeter_import: Unit: Watt. Total grid import at the meter point. Includes ALL power drawn from the grid ‚Äì including battery charging from grid! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_grid_import_daily: Unit: kWh. Total grid import since midnight. Must reset at 0:00. If not available, the value is calculated from the W sensor. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_grid_to_house: Unit: Watt. Grid power flowing directly to the house. Without battery charging from grid! Difference from Smartmeter Import: Only the household consumption portion. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_export: Unit: Watt. Total grid export at the meter point. Includes ALL feed-in ‚Äì including battery feed-in to grid! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_grid_export_daily: Unit: kWh. Total grid export since midnight. Must reset at 0:00. If not available, the value is calculated from the W sensor. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_house_to_grid: Unit: Watt. Surplus power fed into the grid. Only solar surplus, not battery feed-in! Difference from Smartmeter Export: Only the surplus portion. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_grid_import_yearly: Unit: kWh. Total grid import for the current calendar year. Used for annual billing and cost forecast. (Optional)

consumers.title: Consumer Sensors (Optional)
consumers.description:
Configure sensors for additional consumers.

These are OPTIONAL - only configure if you have these devices.

**Required units:**
- Power: Watt (W)
- Energy: kWh (with daily reset)
- COP: Decimal number (e.g. 3.5)
- State: Text (charging/idle)

data_description.sensor_heatpump_power: Unit: Watt. Current electrical power draw of the heat pump. Only compressor consumption, not the heat output! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_heatpump_daily: Unit: kWh. Electrical consumption of the heat pump since midnight. Must reset at 0:00 (e.g. via Utility Meter). (Optional)
data_description.sensor_heatpump_cop: Unit: Decimal (e.g. 3.5). Coefficient of Performance ‚Äì ratio of heat output to electrical input. Fallback: 3.5 if no sensor available. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_heatingrod_power: Unit: Watt. Current electrical power draw of the heating rod. Shown as a separate consumer in the energy flow. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_heatingrod_daily: Unit: kWh. Heating rod consumption since midnight. Must reset at 0:00 (e.g. via Utility Meter). (Optional)
data_description.sensor_wallbox_power: Unit: Watt. Current charging power of the wallbox/charging station. Only actual charging power, not standby power! (Optional)
data_description.sensor_wallbox_daily: Unit: kWh. Wallbox charging consumption since midnight. Must reset at 0:00 (e.g. via Utility Meter). (Optional)
data_description.sensor_wallbox_state: Format: Text. Possible values: 'charging' = vehicle actively charging, 'idle' = ready/no charging. Other values are ignored. (Optional)

panels.title: PV Panel Sensors
panels.description:
Configure up to 4 individual PV panels/strings.

**Required unit:** Watt (W)

data_description.panel1_name: Display name for panel/string 1 (e.g. 'South', 'East', 'Dormer'). Used in charts and reports. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_panel1_power: Unit: Watt. Current power of the PV string/panel. Value directly from inverter, not from a calculated sensor! (Optional)
data_description.panel2_name: Display name for panel/string 2 (e.g. 'South', 'East', 'Dormer'). Used in charts and reports. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_panel2_power: Unit: Watt. Current power of the PV string/panel. Value directly from inverter, not from a calculated sensor! (Optional)
data_description.panel3_name: Display name for panel/string 3 (e.g. 'South', 'East', 'Dormer'). Used in charts and reports. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_panel3_power: Unit: Watt. Current power of the PV string/panel. Value directly from inverter, not from a calculated sensor! (Optional)
data_description.panel4_name: Display name for panel/string 4 (e.g. 'South', 'East', 'Dormer'). Used in charts and reports. (Optional)
data_description.sensor_panel4_power: Unit: Watt. Current power of the PV string/panel. Value directly from inverter, not from a calculated sensor! (Optional)

forecast_comparison.title: Forecast Comparison
forecast_comparison.description:
Configure up to 2 external forecast entities for the 7-day comparison chart.

**Required unit:** kWh (daily forecast)

data_description.forecast_entity_1: Format: sensor.xxx. Sensor with daily yield forecast in kWh (e.g. sensor.solcast_forecast_today). Must contain the expected daily yield as a number. (Optional)
data_description.forecast_entity_1_name: Display name in comparison chart (e.g. 'Solcast'). Shown in the legend of the 7-day comparison. (Optional)
data_description.forecast_entity_2: Format: sensor.xxx. Sensor with daily yield forecast in kWh (e.g. sensor.forecast_solar_energy_today). Must contain the expected daily yield as a number. (Optional)
data_description.forecast_entity_2_name: Display name in comparison chart (e.g. 'Forecast.Solar'). Shown in the legend of the 7-day comparison. (Optional)
